overview: 21yo, Student of Economics and Marketing, Bologna University. He is founder of the iubenda project, a privacy policy generator for website (http://www.iubenda.com). Web Designer for 10 years, Licentiate in Classical Studies (100/100), maximum mark until now at University. Considered a promising young talent, founder and promoter of the project, he received enthusiasm and investing interest by Dpixel (VC Advisor), for developing its idea. Dpixel has currently a coaching role, working on seed financing. He recently won Innovation Camp, a team building and business ideas competition. Great knowledge of web dynamics, involved in several successful web projects during the last years. Competence in Economics, Web Design and Marketing, Community Management, Search Engine Optimization.
